officialTitle: Minimum Effective Volume (MEV95%) of Ropivacaine 7.5 mg/ml to Block the Posterior and Lateral Cords of the Infraclavicular Brachial Plexus
inclusionCriteria:
* . Inclusion criteria are American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I-III, age between 18 and 70 years and body mass index (BMI) between 20 and 35 kg/m2.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusionCriteria: * Exclusion criteria are pregnancy, patients with contraindications to regional anesthesia, allergy to LAs, patients taking opioids regularly due to chronic pain, use of anticoagulation drugs other than acetylsalicylic acid or dipyridamole, atrioventricular block, diabetes.
